entries.details: CLAUDE-TODO system initialized for project: claude-todo

details.title: Fix P0-1: Atomic ID generation for concurrent operations

after.title: Fix P0-1: Atomic ID generation for concurrent operations

before.title: Implement phases command for phase management
before.description: Phase summary with progress. Subcommands: show PHASE, stats. Table with phase name, task counts by status, progress bar, overall status (Pending/InProgress/Completed).

after.title: Implement phases command for phase management
after.description: Phase summary with progress. Subcommands: show PHASE, stats. Table with phase name, task counts by status, progress bar, overall status (Pending/InProgress/Completed).

before.title: Implement index caching for labels and phases
before.description: Cache label-to-task and phase-to-task indices in .claude/.cache/. Checksum-based staleness detection. Lazy regeneration on first query after changes. O(1) lookups.

after.title: Implement index caching for labels and phases
after.description: Cache label-to-task and phase-to-task indices in .claude/.cache/. Checksum-based staleness detection. Lazy regeneration on first query after changes. O(1) lookups.

before.title: Create golden file tests for output regression
before.description: Golden file tests in tests/golden/. Snapshot expected output for list, stats, dash, deps commands. UPDATE_GOLDEN=1 workflow. Normalize timestamps and paths.

after.title: Create golden file tests for output regression
after.description: Golden file tests in tests/golden/. Snapshot expected output for list, stats, dash, deps commands. UPDATE_GOLDEN=1 workflow. Normalize timestamps and paths.

after.title: Fix complete-task.sh backup rotation (no rotation bug)

before.title: Fix validate checksum recovery test
before.description: Test 211 fails

after.title: Fix validate checksum recovery test
after.description: Tests failing: Unit T211, Integration T33, T34. Tests: validate --fix recovers from checksum mismatch, validate --fix preserves task data. Root cause: checksum recalculation or file handling in validate.sh --fix mode. See: scripts/validate.sh, lib/validation.sh

before.title: Fix orphaned dependency cleanup tests
before.description: Tests 216 and 217 fail in archive dependency cleanup

after.title: Fix orphaned dependency cleanup tests
after.description: Tests failing: Unit T216, T217, Integration T42, T43. Tests: orphaned dependencies cleaned on archive, multiple orphaned dependencies all cleaned, orphaned dependency cleanup preserves other dependencies. Root cause: archive.sh dependency cleanup logic not handling all edge cases. See: scripts/archive.sh, lib/analysis.sh

before.title: Fix file locking concurrency tests
before.description: Tests 274 279 280 283 fail due to timing sensitivity

after.title: Fix file locking concurrency tests
after.description: Tests failing: Unit T274, T279, T280, T283. Tests: concurrent lock timeout, lock released on error, lock timeout configurable, race condition prevention. Root cause: timing-sensitive tests that depend on system load and flock behavior. May need test isolation or mocking. See: lib/file-ops.sh lock_file() unlock_file()

before.title: Fix stats command tests
before.description: Tests 606 621 631 fail for period validation and pluralization

after.title: Fix stats command tests
after.description: Tests failing: Unit T606, T621, T631. Tests: stats --period invalid shows error, stats shows 'tasks' for count > 1 (pluralization), stats handles missing .claude directory. Root cause: stats.sh validation and edge case handling. See: scripts/stats.sh

before.title: Fix integration workflow tests (full lifecycle, dependencies)
before.description: 14 integration tests failing: T57-64 (lifecycle/dependency workflows), T69-71 (validation workflows). Tests: full task lifecycle, multiple tasks with dependencies, session workflows, dependency chain completion, unblock workflows, validation workflows, batch operations. Root cause: likely timing or state management issues in complex multi-step scenarios.

Root cause: likely timing or state management issues in complex multi-step scenarios.

before.title: Create unified lib/backup.sh library
before.description: Phase 1 of unified backup architecture. Create centralized backup library with: create_backup(type, file, options), restore_backup(backup_id, options), rotate_backups(type, max), list_backups(type), get_backup_metadata(backup_id). Types: snapshot, safety, incremental, archive, migration. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md for full spec.

after.title: Create unified lib/backup.sh library
after.description: Phase 1 of unified backup architecture. Create centralized backup library with: create_backup(type, file, options), restore_backup(backup_id, options), rotate_backups(type, max), list_backups(type), get_backup_metadata(backup_id). Types: snapshot, safety, incremental, archive, migration. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md for full spec.

before.title: Add CI/CD integration documentation and examples
before.description: Add docs/ci-cd-integration.md with examples for: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, Azure DevOps. Task validation, report generation, pre-deployment checks.

after.title: Add CI/CD integration documentation and examples
after.description: Add docs/ci-cd-integration.md with examples for: GitHub Actions, GitLab CI, Jenkins, Azure DevOps. Task validation, report generation, pre-deployment checks.

before.title: Optimize performance for 1000+ task datasets
before.description: Ensure all commands meet performance targets (<100ms list, <1s stats) for 1000+ tasks. Streaming jq for large files, pagination defaults, lazy loading.

after.title: Optimize performance for 1000+ task datasets
after.description: Ensure all commands meet performance targets (<100ms list, <1s stats) for 1000+ tasks. Streaming jq for large files, pagination defaults, lazy loading.

before.title: Create unified lib/backup.sh library
before.description: Phase 1 of unified backup architecture. Create centralized backup library with: create_backup(type, file, options), restore_backup(backup_id, options), rotate_backups(type, max), list_backups(type), get_backup_metadata(backup_id). Types: snapshot, safety, incremental, archive, migration. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md for full spec.

after.title: Create unified lib/backup.sh library
after.description: Phase 1 of unified backup architecture. Create centralized backup library with: create_backup(type, file, options), restore_backup(backup_id, options), rotate_backups(type, max), list_backups(type), get_backup_metadata(backup_id). Types: snapshot, safety, incremental, archive, migration. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md for full spec.

before.title: Integrate scripts with unified backup library
before.description: Phase 2 of unified backup architecture. Update all scripts to use lib/backup.sh: complete-task.sh, archive.sh, migrate.sh, init.sh. Remove inline backup code, use centralized functions. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md Phase 2.

after.title: Integrate scripts with unified backup library
after.description: Phase 2 of unified backup architecture. Update all scripts to use lib/backup.sh: complete-task.sh, archive.sh, migrate.sh, init.sh. Remove inline backup code, use centralized functions. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md Phase 2.

before.title: Implement backup type taxonomy and directory structure
before.description: New directory structure: .claude/backups/snapshot/, .claude/backups/safety/, .claude/backups/incremental/, .claude/backups/archive/, .claude/backups/migration/. Each backup includes metadata JSON with timestamp, type, source, checksum, description. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md unified directory structure.

after.title: Implement backup type taxonomy and directory structure
after.description: New directory structure: .claude/backups/snapshot/, .claude/backups/safety/, .claude/backups/incremental/, .claude/backups/archive/, .claude/backups/migration/. Each backup includes metadata JSON with timestamp, type, source, checksum, description. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md unified directory structure.

before.title: Add legacy backup migration command
before.description: Phase 3 of unified architecture. Create 'claude-todo backup migrate-legacy' command to move old backups from .claude/.backups/ to new .claude/backups/ structure. Classify by age/type, generate metadata. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md Phase 3.

after.title: Add legacy backup migration command
after.description: Phase 3 of unified architecture. Create 'claude-todo backup migrate-legacy' command to move old backups from .claude/.backups/ to new .claude/backups/ structure. Classify by age/type, generate metadata. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md Phase 3.

before.title: Extend config schema for backup settings
before.description: Add backup configuration to todo-config.json: maxBackups per type, retentionDays per type, compressionEnabled, autoCleanup settings. Update schemas/todo-config.schema.json. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md config extensions.

after.title: Extend config schema for backup settings
after.description: Add backup configuration to todo-config.json: maxBackups per type, retentionDays per type, compressionEnabled, autoCleanup settings. Update schemas/todo-config.schema.json. See: claudedocs/BACKUP-ARCHITECTURE.md config extensions.

before.title: P0: Fix task ID collision under concurrent operations
before.description: File locking exists but ID generation happens BEFORE lock acquisition. Under concurrent load (5 parallel adds), all processes generate same ID causing 80% data loss. Solution: Move ID generation inside locked critical section. See claudedocs/P0-1-RACE-CONDITION-ISSUE.md for full root cause analysis, fix requirements, and implementation plan.

after.title: P0: Fix task ID collision under concurrent operations
after.description: File locking exists but ID generation happens BEFORE lock acquisition. Under concurrent load (5 parallel adds), all processes generate same ID causing 80% data loss. Solution: Move ID generation inside locked critical section. See claudedocs/P0-1-RACE-CONDITION-ISSUE.md for full root cause analysis, fix requirements, and implementation plan.

before.title: Add dependency check to install.sh before installation
before.description: install.sh should check for required dependencies (jq, bash 4+) BEFORE installing. Currently installs without checking, leaving user with broken install. Add check_dependencies() function that: 1) Checks jq exists, 2) Checks bash version >= 4.0, 3) Provides platform-specific install instructions, 4) Optionally offers to install deps (apt/brew/yum).

after.title: Add dependency check to install.sh before installation
after.description: install.sh should check for required dependencies (jq, bash 4+) BEFORE installing. Currently installs without checking, leaving user with broken install. Add check_dependencies() function that: 1) Checks jq exists, 2) Checks bash version >= 4.0, 3) Provides platform-specific install instructions, 4) Optionally offers to install deps (apt/brew/yum).

before.title: Add jq check to export.sh and migrate.sh
before.description: export.sh and migrate.sh are missing 'command -v jq' checks that all other scripts have. Add standard check_deps() call at script start.

after.title: Add jq check to export.sh and migrate.sh
after.description: export.sh and migrate.sh are missing 'command -v jq' checks that all other scripts have. Add standard check_deps() call at script start.

before.title: Add bash version check to platform-compat.sh
before.description: Add check_bash_version() to platform-compat.sh that verifies BASH_VERSION >= 4.0. Required for associative arrays used in caching. Currently fails silently with cryptic errors on bash 3.x (macOS default).

after.title: Add bash version check to platform-compat.sh
after.description: Add check_bash_version() to platform-compat.sh that verifies BASH_VERSION >= 4.0. Required for associative arrays used in caching. Currently fails silently with cryptic errors on bash 3.x (macOS default).

before.title: Create dependency auto-installer option
before.description: Add --install-deps flag to install.sh that automatically installs missing dependencies using detected package manager (apt, brew, yum, dnf). Include --dry-run to show what would be installed.

after.title: Create dependency auto-installer option
after.description: Add --install-deps flag to install.sh that automatically installs missing dependencies using detected package manager (apt, brew, yum, dnf). Include --dry-run to show what would be installed.

details.title: Add date/find POSIX tools check to install.sh

after.title: Add date/find POSIX tools check to install.sh

before.title: Create dependency auto-installer option
before.description: Add --install-deps flag to install.sh that automatically installs missing dependencies using detected package manager (apt, brew, yum, dnf). Include --dry-run to show what would be installed.

after.title: Create dependency auto-installer option
after.description: Add --install-deps flag to install.sh that automatically installs missing dependencies using detected package manager (apt, brew, yum, dnf). Depends on all core dependency checks being in place first. Include --dry-run to show what would be installed. This is the final piece after all individual checks are implemented.

before.title: Add dependency check to install.sh before installation
before.description: install.sh should check for required dependencies (jq, bash 4+) BEFORE installing. Currently installs without checking, leaving user with broken install. Add check_dependencies() function that: 1) Checks jq exists, 2) Checks bash version >= 4.0, 3) Provides platform-specific install instructions, 4) Optionally offers to install deps (apt/brew/yum).

after.title: Add dependency check to install.sh before installation
after.description: Add comprehensive dependency check to install.sh before installation begins. This is the master dependency validation that calls individual checks for: jq, bash 4+, sha256sum/shasum, tar, flock, numfmt, date/find. Must run BEFORE any files are copied. Provides clear error messages with platform-specific install instructions (apt/brew/yum/dnf). Exit code 1 if critical deps missing.

before.title: Show character count in title length validation error
before.description: When title exceeds 120 char limit, error message should display actual character count to help user understand how much to trim. Example: 'Title too long (145/120 characters)'

before.title: Document --notes/--skip-notes requirement for complete command
before.description: The complete command now requires either --notes 'description' or --skip-notes flag. This UX change needs documentation in help text, QUICK-REFERENCE.md, and TODO_Task_Management.md

after.title: Document --notes/--skip-notes requirement for complete command
after.description: The complete command now requires either --notes 'description' or --skip-notes flag. This UX change needs documentation in help text, QUICK-REFERENCE.md, and TODO_Task_Management.md

before.title: Improve phase validation errors with valid options and add-phase flag
before.description: When invalid phase used: 1) List valid phases from phase index in error message, 2) Add --add-phase flag to create new phase on-the-fly when intentionally adding new phases. Example error: 'Phase not found. Valid: setup, core, polish. Use --add-phase to create new.'

after.title: Improve phase validation errors with valid options and add-phase flag
after.description: When invalid phase used: 1) List valid phases from phase index in error message, 2) Add --add-phase flag to create new phase on-the-fly when intentionally adding new phases. Example error: 'Phase not found. Valid: setup, core, polish. Use --add-phase to create new.'
